headline: Kobe Bryant 1978-2020
abstract: Bryant, who died with his daughter Gianna in a helicopter crash on Sunday, was an unquestioned basketball great, but his legacy is not so straightforward.
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant, who made the leap directly from high school to a glittering 20-year career with the Los Angeles Lakers that established him as one of basketballâ€™s all-time greats, was among nine people killed in a helicopter crash on Sunday north of Los Angeles. Bryant was 41.
